title: Annotate Chart
description: Annotate important dates (feature releases, marketing campaigns, etc.) on Amplitude charts.

app_id.title: App ID
app_id.description: The Project ID of the project your chart belongs to.

chart_id.title: Chart ID
chart_id.description: The ID of the chart (found in Amplitude chart's URL) you wish to annotate.

details.title: Additional details
details.description: Additional details you would like to add to the annotation.
